00057 extern "C" {
00058 
00059 EGS_GTRANSFORMED_EXPORT EGS_BaseGeometry* createGeometry(EGS_Input *input) {
00060     int error = 0; EGS_BaseGeometry *g = 0;
00061     EGS_Input *ij = input->takeInputItem("geometry",false);
00062     if( ij ) {
00063         g = EGS_BaseGeometry::createSingleGeometry(ij);
00064         delete ij;
00065         if( !g ) {
00066             egsWarning("createGeometry(gtransformed): got a null pointer"
00067                     " as a geometry?\n"); return 0;
00068         }
00069     }
00070     if( !g ) {
00071         string gname;
00072         int err = input->getInput("my geometry",gname);
00073         if( err ) {
00074             egsWarning(
00075                "createGeometry(gtransformed): my geometry must be defined\n"
00076                "  either inline or using 'my geometry = some_name'\n");
00077             return 0;
00078         }
00079         g = EGS_BaseGeometry::getGeometry(gname);
00080         if( !g ) {
00081             egsWarning("createGeometry(gtransformed): no geometry named %s"
00082                     " is defined\n",gname.c_str()); return 0;
00083         }
00084     }
00085     g->ref();
00086     EGS_AffineTransform *t = EGS_AffineTransform::getTransformation(input);
00087     EGS_BaseGeometry *result;
00088     if( !t ) {
00089         egsWarning("createGeometry(gtransformed): null transformation."
00090                 " I hope you know what you are doing\n");
00091         result = new EGS_TransformedGeometry(g,EGS_AffineTransform());
00092     } else {
00093         if( t->isI() ) egsWarning("createGeometry(gtransformed): "
00094                 "unity transformation. I hope you know what you are doing\n");
00095         result = new EGS_TransformedGeometry(g,*t);
00096         delete t;
00097     }
00098     result->setName(input);
00099     result->setLabels(input);
00100     return result;
00101 
00102 }
00103

00105 void EGS_TransformedGeometry::getLabelRegions (const string &str, vector<int> &regs) {
00106 
00107     // label defined in the geometry being transformed
00108     g->getLabelRegions(str, regs);
00109 
00110     // label defined in self (transformation input block)
00111     EGS_BaseGeometry::getLabelRegions(str, regs);
00112 
00113 }
